title: B-7 "Maz Hatters"

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may select a player during the night, purging them of all negative status effects.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are immune to all negative status effects.

desc:
Post 4485
*" All remaining survivors are advised to remain in the evacuation shelter or any other safe area until the unit has secured the facility. "*
